title: Role Awareness and Learning Design Simulation Workshop for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational education theories and basic classroom management concepts
context.additional_context: A classroom enabling simulation tool utilization and collaborative learning in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment.

learning_goals: Participants can identify various roles of a teacher (e.g., leader, facilitator, evaluator) through simulation activities with over 80% accuracy.
Participants can use a self-reflection guide to document their decision-making processes in classroom situations and derive at least three improvement points.
Participants can revise and supplement their role-performance strategies by at least two methods based on feedback during peer mentoring activities.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
